comment:
stand-mixer:A stand-mixer is a kitchen appliance used for mixing ingredients, typically in baking, by rotating a set of beaters or a dough hook.
slow bake oven:A slow bake oven is an appliance used for baking food at a lower temperature over a longer period of time, often used for bread and pastries to achieve a desired texture and flavor.
total profit maximization:Total profit maximization refers to the process of determining the optimal combination of products and production methods to achieve the highest overall profit for a business.
